text: Abasya'i allaha tamra rasulake sbapnati yathayathabhabe satye parinata kare diyechena [1], allahara icchaya tomara abasya'i masajidula-harame prabesa karabe nirapade --- matha mundana kare ebam cula chemte, nirbhaye. Atahpara tini (allaha) jenechena ya tomara jana ni. Sutaram e chara'o tini tomaderake diyechena eka sadya bijaya
